attributes.action: hold a referendum as follows: which do the public wish their taxes to be spent on: properly funding NHS care and decent pensions or wars in Iraq, Afghanistan and Trident upgrades?
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Do we really give greater priority to funding fighting wars and building ever-more destructive WMDs on behalf (allegedly) of other non-contributing nations or would we rather look after our own sick and elderly in a way which allows dignity?
